title: Resident Advisor Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Newman Center (Champaign, IL) in Nov 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was extensive but positive. 3 rounds of interviews. The process is leadership and mission-focused, based on what the job entails. Be prepared and passionate, ready to speak to your past leadership experiences and your "why".
Interview Questions: Why do you want to be an RA?
